author: prestonvanloon
content: Does anyone have any tool to do ssz stuff? I want to get a hash tree root value of a given beacon state to rule out a potential bug

author: scottypoi
content: there is a simple serialize browser tool at www.simpleserialize.com

author: prestonvanloon
content: thanks! that was freezing when trying a beacon state (2.7mb). I forgot about proto's zcli and that is working for me. Thanks!
